<grammar root="smarthome">
    <rule id="smarthome">

            <tag>out.order= new Object(); out.order.object=rules.order.entity; out.order.change=rules.order.action;</tag>

        </one-of>
        </rule>


    <rule id="position">
        <one-of>
            <item>open<tag>out='open';</tag></item>
            <item>close<tag>out='close';</tag></item>
        </one-of>
        </rule>

    <rule id="transition">
            <one-of>
                <item>on</item>
                <item>off</item>
            </one-of>
        </rule>

    <rule id="appliance">
        the
        <one-of>
            <item>light<tag>out='light';</tag></item>
            <item>AC<tag>out='air conditioning';</tag></item>
            <item>A C<tag>out='air conditioning';</tag></item>
            <item>air conditioning</item>
            <item>heat<tag> out='heat';</tag></item>
        </one-of>
        </rule>

    <rule id="opening">
        the
        <one-of>
            <item>door</item>
            <item>window</item>
        </one-of>
        </rule>
    
 <rule id="order">

      <ruleref uri="#verb"/>
      <ruleref uri="#transition"/>
      <ruleref uri="#appliance"/>

      </item>

      <item>

      <ruleref uri="#appliance"/>
      <ruleref uri="#transition"/>

      <ruleref uri="#opening"/>
      <ruleref uri="#transition"/>
        <tag> out.action=rules.position; out.entity=rules.opening;</tag>
      </item>

  </one-of>
</rule>
";

sourcesContent:
export const grammar = `
<grammar root="smarthome">
    <rule id="smarthome">
        <ruleref uri="#order"/>
            <tag>out.order= new Object(); out.order.object=rules.order.entity; out.order.change=rules.order.action;</tag>
        </rule>

    <rule id="verb">
        <one-of>
            <item>turn<tag>out='turn';</tag></item>
        </one-of>
        </rule>


    <rule id="position">
        <one-of>
            <item>open<tag>out='open';</tag></item>
            <item>close<tag>out='close';</tag></item>
        </one-of>
        </rule>

    <rule id="transition">
            <one-of>
                <item>on</item>
                <item>off</item>
            </one-of>
        </rule>

    <rule id="appliance">
        the
        <one-of>
            <item>light<tag>out='light';</tag></item>
            <item>AC<tag>out='air conditioning';</tag></item>
            <item>A C<tag>out='air conditioning';</tag></item>
            <item>air conditioning</item>
            <item>heat<tag> out='heat';</tag></item>
        </one-of>
        </rule>

    <rule id="opening">
        the
        <one-of>
            <item>door</item>
            <item>window</item>
        </one-of>
        </rule>
    
 <rule id="order">
  <one-of>
   
      <item>
      <ruleref uri="#verb"/>
      <ruleref uri="#transition"/>
      <ruleref uri="#appliance"/>
        <tag> out.action=rules.verb; out.entity=rules.appliance;</tag>
      </item>

      <item>
      <ruleref uri="#verb"/>
      <ruleref uri="#appliance"/>
      <ruleref uri="#transition"/>
        <tag> out.action=rules.verb; out.entity=rules.appliance; </tag>
      </item>

      <item>
      <ruleref uri="#position"/>
      <ruleref uri="#opening"/>
      <ruleref uri="#transition"/>
        <tag> out.action=rules.position; out.entity=rules.opening;</tag>
      </item>

  </one-of>
</rule>
`
